ability.Ultra-Inductive: Has a 30% chance to cause the Pokemon making contact with Lightning into Inductive. Special attacks from inductive Pokemon deal halved damage to Lightning.
ability.Ultra-Recharge: The power of Lightning Punch will get stronger with its speed stat, +20 power each boost.

Lightning Punch.effect: 30% chance to paralyze the opponent. Deals double damage to the inductive opponent.

Drain Punch.effect: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target.

Super Electro Bombardment.effect: Imposes the user itself and all opponents into inductive states. Lightning acquires an electro shield which reduces the damage from the next attack by 50%.

Meteor Mash.effect: Has a 20% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.

Electro Boost.effect: Removes the user's inductive state and increase the speed by 2 stages.
